 After you've applied 
 Once you pay and submit your application, you will  receive a confirmation email  within 24 hours with an attached PDF copy of your application. This email will include an eight-digit student ID number that you will use throughout your studies should you be accepted at Concordia. If you didn’t get the confirmation email (and you can’t find it in your junk mail folder either), call us at 514-848-2424, extension 2668 or email  study@concordia.ca . We will send you your student ID number. 
When can I expect a decision? 
 There are a number of factors which influence when you will receive a decision. 
 Receiving your application and required supporting documents by the application deadline 
 Where you last went to school 
 Whether your program has additional requirements such as: audition, portfolio, interview, etc.

 March to June

 Remember that we cannot make a decision on your application until we have received all of the required supporting documents. The timelines listed above are based on applications and supporting material received by the deadline. 
 You can check your “To Do List” and your application status online by logging into  MyConcordia.ca  and going to  My Student Centre . 
 Once you submit a required document, we will review your file again and remove that item from your “To Do List” in your Student Centre.  Please note that it may take up to 15 working days to update your file.  Please do not upload a document more than once. 
 Check your application status online 
 You can keep tabs on your application status online. Log into  MyConcordia.ca  and go to  My Student Centre . 
 Offers of Admission 
 If you can see through My Student Centre that you have been admitted, congratulations! You will soon receive your Offer of Admission via email. Once you receive the email, you will be able to access the Offer of Admission online. You will not receive a hard copy by mail. We communicate admission decisions to you by email – not over the phone. Please double check your email junk folder if you have not received any emails from Concordia. 
 Contact us 
 To contact our admissions staff about questions regarding your application, email us at  study@concordia.ca .
